location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government at Bombay to William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter encloses a letter from J A Maude, Captain of the ship Favorite, to Francis Warden, dated 8 May 1816, regarding the passage to Bombay of Nicolas Lascerath who was shipwrecked off Corfu and granted passage to India in order to meet his brother in Calcutta.Warden informs Bruce that he does not approve of such persons being sent to India.
